name: gotoHuman_list-forms
description: List all available review forms. NOTE: You need to fetch the schema for the form fields first using the get-form-schema tool.

name: gotoHuman_get-form-schema
description: Get the schema to use for the 'fields' property when requesting a human review with a form.

formId.description: The form ID to fetch the schema for

name: gotoHuman_request-human-review-with-form
description: Request a human review with a form. NOTE: If you don't have a form ID yet, list all available forms using the list-forms tool first. To know what to pass for fieldData, you need to fetch the schema for the form fields using the get-form-schema tool.

formId.description: The form ID to request a human review for

fieldData.description: The field data to include in the review request. Note that this is a dynamic schema that you need to fetch first using the get-form-schema tool.

metadata.description: Optional additional data that will be incl. in the webhook response after form submission. Incl. everything required to proceed with your workflow.

assignToUsers.description: Optional list of user emails to assign the review to
